qa.name: Emily
qa.essence: Curious historian with a passion for old books
qa.appearance: Mid-length brown hair, glasses, and a cardigan

hf.name: Marcus
hf.essence: Enigmatic antiquarian with a mysterious past
hf.appearance: Salt-and-pepper hair, beard, and intense eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: As the pages turned, memories long buried began to surface.
json_to_edit.description: Emily and Marcus discover a forgotten tome that unlocks secrets from the past.
json_to_edit.lighting: Soft, golden light filtering through windows
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Creaking floorboards, rustling pages, distant street noise
json_to_edit.name: Forgotten Tome
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Emily and Marcus uncover a mysterious book that reveals forgotten history.

qa.action: Emily enters the cluttered antique bookshop, eyes wide with wonder.

hf.action: Marcus emerges from behind a bookshelf, carrying an ornate, leather-bound volume.

tr.action: The book falls open to reveal intricate illustrations and cryptic text.

xc.action: Emily and Marcus lean in, their faces illuminated by the golden light as they study the book.

ka.action: Marcus's eyes widen in recognition as he sees a familiar symbol in the book.

fn.action: Emily looks up at Marcus, noticing his changed demeanor and sensing the weight of unspoken history.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: As the pages turned, memories long buried began to surface.
updated_json.description: Emily and Marcus discover a forgotten tome that unlocks secrets from the past.
updated_json.lighting: Soft, golden light filtering through windows
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Creaking floorboards, rustling pages, distant street noise
updated_json.name: Forgotten Tome
updated_json.scene_summary: Emily and Marcus uncover a mysterious book that reveals forgotten history.

qa.action: Emily enters the cluttered antique bookshop, eyes wide with wonder.

hf.action: Marcus emerges from behind a bookshelf, carrying an ornate, leather-bound volume.

xc.action: Emily and Marcus lean in, their faces illuminated by the golden light as they study the book.

fn.action: Emily looks up at Marcus, noticing his changed demeanor and sensing the weight of unspoken history.

label.rationale:
we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots "tr" and "ka" from the original six shots. here's how we'll proceed:

1. update the "number_of_shots" from "6" to "4".
2. remove the "tr" and "ka" entries from the "shots" dictionary.
3. update the "list_display_order" in the "shots" dictionary to reflect the new order without the removed shots.

all other elements of the json, including the scene description, location, lighting, and remaining shots, will remain the same.
